pkgmetadata.longdescription: ========VISA Web========Polls is a simple Django app to conduct Web-based VISA interface. Execute and log VISA operations.Detailed documentation is in the "docs" directory.Quick start-----------1. Add "visaweb" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting like this:: INSTALLED_APPS = [ ... 'visaweb', ]2. Include the visaweb URLconf in your project urls.py like this:: url(r'^polls/', include('polls.urls')),3. Run `python3 manage.py migrate` to create the polls models.4. Start the development server and visit http://127.0.0.1:8000/admin/ to create a VISA alias (you'll need the Admin app enabled).5. Visit http://127.0.0.1:8000/visaweb/ to participate in the poll.
